name: Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses incidents where an attacker used a command interpreter to execute malicious scripts, leading to an exfiltration of sensitive data.

decision--8e50b40e-9b2f-4a61-b0bc-daec4e.name: Check if malicious PowerShell processes are detected

action--6b5f9f64-ebcd-44b5-b4cd-1fc07790.name: Kill malicious PowerShell processes
action--6b5f9f64-ebcd-44b5-b4cd-1fc07790.description: Terminate any malicious PowerShell scripts that are currently executing.

action--4fdab54f-1e6a-45be-b6d7-88e0f88c.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--4fdab54f-1e6a-45be-b6d7-88e0f88c.description: Disable network access for the compromised host to prevent further data exfiltration.

parallel--d4ec38d2-9ff1-4458-9af6-cc3bde.name: Conduct Post-Incident Actions
parallel--d4ec38d2-9ff1-4458-9af6-cc3bde.description: Perform additional mitigation actions in parallel.

action--8aee9de9-b1d7-4483-80b9-ae9babd5.name: Scan system for additional malware
action--8aee9de9-b1d7-4483-80b9-ae9babd5.description: Perform a full system scan for malware, repeating until the system is clean.

loop--b1e4f1e5-71c2-4f20-9156-26d67f1914.name: Check if scan result is clean
loop--b1e4f1e5-71c2-4f20-9156-26d67f1914.description: Repeat scanning until the scan result indicates the system is clean.
